par_segtext: 'di lta ste /
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /
brgya byin dang tshangs pa 'dod pa dang /
skye ba la gnas te tshangs par spyod pa dang /
dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags pa dang /
longs spyod bdog pa rnams la ser sna byed pa dang /
sems can rnams la mnyam par mi sbyin pa dang /
tshul khrims la lhod pa dang /
gzhan gyi sems mi bsrung ba dang /
gnod sems dang /
khong khro ba'i bag la nyal byed pa dang /
des sems zhum pa dang /
brjed ngas pa dang /
thos pa don du mi gnyer ba dang /
dpyod pa med pa dang /
'phags pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa dang ;
nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal 'phel ba dang /
lus dang ngag dang sems kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang /
dam pa'i chos yongs su mi bsrung ba dang /
slob dpon chos 'chab pa dang /
bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams 'dor ba dang /
yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos gtong ba dang /
sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang /
byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo ba ste phung po gsum dang mi mthun pa dang /
dge ba'i rtsa ba chung dus rlom sems su byed pa dang /
thabs med par lhung ba'i blo dang /
phyir zhing dkon mchog gi bsngags pa mi smra ba dang ;
byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par sems pa dang /
ma thos pa'i chos spong ba dang /
bdud kyi las khong du mi chud pa dang /
'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dang /
sems can yongs su smin par mi byed pa dang /
'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ste /
root_segtext: 'putri/ dvātriṃśad ime mahāyānasya āntarāyikāḥ samyak vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
root_string: tadyathā- śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānakāmitā, indrabrahmatvakāmitā, janmasaṃsthabrahmacaryam, kuśalamūlaikarāgaḥ, bhogasampatmātsaryam, sattvaviṣamadānam, śīlaśaithilyam, paracittārakṣaṇam, vyāpāda-pratighānuśayaḥ, taccittalayaḥ, muṣitasmṛtitā, śravaṇānarthikatā, avicāraṇā, anāryacaryā, mānātimānavivṛddhiḥ, kāya-vāk-citta-karmāpariśuddhiḥ, saddharmāparirakṣaṇam, ācāryadharmapraticchādanam, saṃgrahavastūtsargaḥ, sammodanīyadharmatyāgaḥ, pāpamitrasevanam, bodhyapariṇāmaneti triskandhavipakṣatā, alpakuśalamūlamanyanā, anupāyapatitabuddhiḥ, parāṅmukhībhūya triratnāśaṃsanam, bodhisattvavyāpādacintanam / aśrutadharmaprahāṇam, mārakarmānavabodhaḥ, lokāyatamantragrahaṇam, sattvāparipācanam, saṃsārādaparikheda', iti /
par_string: 'di lta ste / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa 'dod pa dang / skye ba la gnas te tshangs par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags pa dang / longs spyod bdog pa rnams la ser sna byed pa dang / sems can rnams la mnyam par mi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims la lhod pa dang / gzhan gyi sems mi bsrung ba dang / gnod sems dang / khong khro ba'i bag la nyal byed pa dang / des sems zhum pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / thos pa don du mi gnyer ba dang / dpyod pa med pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa dang ; nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal 'phel ba dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su mi bsrung ba dang / slob dpon chos 'chab pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams 'dor ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos gtong ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo ba ste phung po gsum dang mi mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung dus rlom sems su byed pa dang / thabs med par lhung ba'i blo dang / phyir zhing dkon mchog gi bsngags pa mi smra ba dang ; byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par sems pa dang / ma thos pa'i chos spong ba dang / bdud kyi las khong du mi chud pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par mi byed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ste /
